mapper.select: SELECT mem_num, mem_email, mem_auth, mem_nickname, mem_passwd FROM member LEFT OUTER JOIN member_detail USING (mem_num) WHERE mem_email = #{mem_email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_detail ( mem_num, name, passwd, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2) VALUES ( #{mem_num}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2} )
